freshservice_domain.description: Please enter your Freshservice domain (e.g., your-domain.freshservice.com)

api_key.description: Please enter your Freshservice API key

workspace_id.description: Freshservice Workspace ID (default: 2 for 'CXI Change Management')

department_id.description: Freshservice Department ID for change requests (optional - leave blank if not using departments)

plan_type.description: Select your Freshservice plan to configure API rate limits

assetTypeNames.description: Comma-separated list of asset type names to include (e.g., 'Software, IT Software, ISP')

safetyMargin.description: Safety margin for API rate limits as percentage (default: 70)

rate_limit_overall.description: Overall API rate limit per minute

searchCacheTimeout.description: How long to cache search results in milliseconds (default: 7000)

paginationDelay.description: Delay between paginated API requests in milliseconds (default: 500)

listRequestersPageLimit.description: Maximum number of pages to fetch for requesters (default: 10)

listAgentsPageLimit.description: Maximum number of pages to fetch for agents (default: 10)

enableDebugMode.description: Enable additional logging and debugging features
